title: Denver Nuggets President Tim Connelly
description:
Denver Nuggets President of Basketball Operations Tim Connelly joins The Woj Pod to discuss the NBA shutdown, the franchise's quarantine, how the league could be changed coming out of the hiatus (14:49) and ... his love for 1980's and 1990's professional wrestling (30:40).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
